channel.title: Raspberry on open collector
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry on open collector

item.title: A modular Pi camera enclosure
item.description: TL;DR: I made a modular Raspberry Pi camera case; it’s now released. This was mostly borne out of wanting to position the camera head while keeping the cabling as tidy as possible. And while printed joints are pretty cool to design, i’ve been unable to find a viable replacement for quality metal fasteners. The printed M2.5 bolt and nut in the picture above are pretty neat, they’re not sturdy enough to recommend for use.
